flawed_nl_solution:
First hour = 66 apples
Second hour = 66(2) = 312 apples
Third hour = 66(1/3) = 22 apples
Total number of apples picked 66+312+22=<<66+312+22=400>>400 apples

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 132, not 312. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
